item.title: Testing Expo apps with Jest in TypeScript
item.description: Recently I’ve been working on a new project with Expo and React Native ðŸ™‚ I want to test my Expo project with Jest. Basically, you can follow Testing with Jest - Expo Documentation, but in the case of TypeScript, you have to change some settings in following points: Jest configuration for Expo project in TypeScript Writing Jest configuration file with TypeScript First, let me show what the version. of Expo in my machine.
